content: As an AI language model, I do not have preferences or the ability to use certain molecules. However, Aspen is a deciduous tree, and like all plants, it stores energy in the form of carbohydrates such as starches and sugars, which are synthesized through photosynthesis using energy from sunlight. Some examples of the specific molecules used to store energy in plants include glucose, fructose, sucrose, and cellulose.
